Package Controllers

Class welcome_controller

java.lang.Object
Controllers.welcome_controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class welcome_controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class defines the methods and serves as the controller for the welcome/customer page.

    void
    addCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method changes the scene from the current page to the add customer page.
    void
    deleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method deletes the selected customer from the database and local observable list, or returns if null.
    void
    editCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method takes the value selected in the table, (or returns if null) and passes the value to the edit page as it initialized.
    void
    filterByCountry(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method filters the values in the division dropdown, and the customers in the table, by the value selected in the country dropdown based on whether the division if found in the given country value.
    void
    filterByDivisions(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method filters the table by the selected division dropdown.
    void

    This method initializes the page, populating the table with all the customer data.
    void
    resetTable(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method resets all search and dropdown UI elements and repopulates the table with the all customers observable list.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the page, populating the table with all the customer data. The lambda function converts the division id value for each row to the matchingdivision name.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Unused parameter.
      resourceBundle - Unused parameter.

    • sign_out

      public void sign_out(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method logs the user out of the application, going back to the login poge. Collects the resource bundle information to name the login page in the current language. Prints to login_activity log that the user signed out.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Action taken to trigger method.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown from page change.

    • searchCustomers

      public void searchCustomers(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Control for the text field search input. If field is not null, searches the customers lists for the customer with the matching name or ID.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Action taken to trigger method.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method changes the scene from the current page to the add customer page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Action taken to trigger method.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown for page change.

    • editCustomer

      public void editCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method takes the value selected in the table, (or returns if null) and passes the value to the edit page as it initialized.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Action taken to trigger method.
      Throws:

    • filterByCountry

      public void filterByCountry(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method filters the values in the division dropdown, and the customers in the table, by the value selected in the country dropdown based on whether the division if found in the given country value.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Action taken to trigger method.
